Overall demand picture Believe it will be before the California market will get back to demand levels demand down approximately mmcfd demand will be flat growth in demand will begin return to demand curtailed demand for power and subsequently gas Gas transmission capacity into the state Over the next two to three years there will be an additional Bcfd of transmission capacity into California mmcfd in mmcfd in Kern River expansion mmcfd El Paso conversion of All American oil line and power up San Juan basin gas San Juan basin production is declining first half of vs first half of
